chat.title: Vercel AI SDK v5 Demo:: Tool Streaming
chat.subtitle: Ask me to create a project and watch the real-time progress!
chat.welcomeText: Try asking me to create a project. For example:

suggestions.simple: Create a simple web application called 'Portfolio Site'
suggestions.medium: Build a medium-complexity dashboard named 'Analytics Dashboard'
suggestions.complex: Develop a complex e-commerce platform called 'Online Store Pro'
